name: resource_identifier
displayName: Unique identifier of the resource used for identification within the NFDI4Health.

name: resource_classification
dataverseAlias: Classification of the resource within the predefined categories
displayName: Group of items providing Information about classification of the resource within the predefined categories.

name: resource_type
displayName: A term describing the resource. You can register a study, a study protocoll, a questionnaire, etc.

name: resource_type_general
dataverseAlias: A more general type of the resource
displayName: A more general term describing the resource which forms a pair with the property "Type of the resource" (e.g. "Questionnaire"/"Text") You can select "Text" for most of the study documents, e.g. for questionnaires, informed consent forms, case report forms, etc.

name: resource_titles
displayName: Group of items providing Information about title(s)/name(s) of the resource.

name: text
displayName: Scientific unabbreviated title or name of the resource. Please provide at least one title/name of the resource. If the original title is not in English, please also provide an English translation of the original title.

name: resource_acronyms
displayName: Group of items providing Information about acronym(s) of the resource.

name: resource_acronyms_text
displayName: If existing, acronym(s) of the resource. The property refers primarily to studies which often have an acronym. For other types of resources, a short title (preferably up to 5 words) can be provided, e.g. "NAKO-COVID Questionnaire".

name: resource_description_english
displayName: Group of items with an English description of the resource.

name: resource_description_english_text
displayName: A short plain text summary describing the resource in English. The provided information should be understandable by scientific audience.

name: resource_descriptions_non_english
displayName: Group of items with description(s) of the resource written not in English.

name: resource_descriptions_non_english_text
displayName: Short plain text summary of the resource other than in English. Additional descriptions of the resource are optional. The provided information should be understandable by scientific audience.

name: resource_keywords
displayName: Group of items providing Information about keywords describing the resource.

name: resource_keywords_label
displayName: Keyword(s) describing the resource. Preferably, use terms from MeSH (https://meshb.nlm.nih.gov/search) or UMLS (https://uts.nlm.nih.gov/uts/umls/home).

name: resource_keywords_label_code
displayName: If known, the code of the keyword in a classification/vocabulary. If found, the code from the classification/vocabulary used.

name: resource_languages
displayName: Language(s) in which a study/substudy is conducted, or a language in which a study document is composed. Select all that apply.

name: resource_web_page
displayName: If existing, a link to the web page directly relevant to the resource.

name: resource_non_study_details
displayName: Group of items applicable only to the resources which are not a study/substudy.

name: resource_version
displayName: If existing, the version number of the resource.

name: resource_format
displayName: Technical format of the resource. E.g., XML, PDF, XLSX, etc.

name: resource_use_rights
dataverseAlias: Information about the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Group of items providing Information about the rights to (re-)use the resource.

name: resource_use_rights_label
displayName: License defining the rights to (re-)use the resource. Select one value from the list. If “Other” is selected, an explanation of the (re-)use terms and conditions can be provided in the property “Additional information about use rights”.

name: resource_use_rights_confirmations
dataverseAlias: Important nformation about licensing, if a Creative Commons liesense is selected.
displayName: Group of items applicable if a Creative Commons liesense is selected.

name: resource_use_rights_authors_confirmation_1
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors have authority to license the [RESOURCE]?
displayName: Confirmation that the authors have authority to license the resource.

name: resource_use_rights_authors_confirmation_2
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors have read and understood the terms of the chosen license?
displayName: Confirmation that the authors have read and understand the terms of the chosen license.

name: resource_use_rights_authors_confirmation_3
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is irrevocable?
displayName: Confirmation that the authors understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is not revocable.

name: resource_use_rights_support_by_licencing
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors allow NFDI4Health to license the document?
displayName: Confirmation that NFDI4Health is allowed to licence the document, i.e. to mark the resource with the licence information.

name: resource_use_rights_description
displayName: Any additional descriptive information explaining terms and conditions to (re-)use the resource. If “Other” is selected in the property "License", the preferred license or terms and conditions for (re-)use can be specified here.

name: roles
displayName: Group of items providing information about person(s), group(s) of persons or institution(s)/organisation(s) contributing to the resource.

name: role_name_type
displayName: Personal or organisational/group type of the name. Personal or organisational/group name?

name: role_name_organisational_group
displayName: Group of items providing information about group(s) of persons, institution(s) or organisation(s) contributing to the resource. Organisational name can be used to denote a research group or an institution.

name: type
displayName: Type of the role an organisation, institution or group fulllfils. For example, this can be a sponsor of the study or a group of authors of the document. Which role does the organisation/institution/group/etc. fulllfil? Select one value from the list.

name: role_name_organisational_group_name
displayName: Name of the organisation, institution or group.

name: role_name_organisational_group_type_funding_id
displayName: Identifier assigned by a funder to the resource. If available, you can enter a funding identifier

name: role_name_personal
displayName: Group of items providing information about person(s) contributing to the resource.

name: role_name_personal_type
displayName: Type of the role a person fulllfils. For example, this can be a principal investigator of a study or an author of a document. Which role does the person fulllfil? Select one value from the list.

name: role_name_identifiers
displayName: Group of items providing information about digital identifiers of the person.

name: role_name_identifiers_identifier
displayName: Digital identifier of the person according to a definite scheme. Preferably, provide an ORCID (https://orcid.org/).

name: scheme
dataverseAlias: Which type of identifer is reported?

name: role_email
displayName: Email address of the person, group of persons or institution/organisation.

name: role_phone
displayName: Phone number of the person, group of persons or institution/organisation. Please, use the International ITU-T E.164-number structure for geographic areas, e.g. +49 (0)153 1112233.

name: role_affiliations
dataverseAlias: Further information about organisation(s) associated with the role
displayName: Group of items providing further information about the organisation(s) associated with the role.

name: role_affiliation_name
displayName: Name of the organisation associated with the role. If you are have already entered the name of the organistion in the property "Name of the organisation/institution/group", please repeat it here.

name: role_affiliation_address
displayName: Address of the organisation associated with the role.

name: role_affiliation_web_page
displayName: Web page of the organisation associated with the role.

name: role_affiliation_identifiers
displayName: Group of items providing information about identifiers of the organisation.

name: role_affiliation_identifiers_identifier
displayName: Digital identifier of the organisation according to a definite scheme. Preferably, provide an identifier from ROR (https://ror.org/search).

name: role_affiliation_identifiers_scheme
displayName: Type of the identifier scheme. Which type of identifer is reported?

name: ids_alternative
displayName: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) assigned to the given resource by another registering systems, e.g. a register of clinical trials or a data repository. If the [RESOURCE] is registered in other systems (e.g. a register of clinical trials or a data repository), you can provide corresponding identifier(s) here.

name: ids_alternative_type
displayName: Type/name of the system where the given resource is already registered.

name: ids_alternative_identifier
displayName: Identifier (ID) assigened to the given resource by another registering system, e.g. by a register of clinical trials or a data repository. E. g., DRKS00021273, NCT04327505, etc.

name: ids
dataverseAlias: Related publications, datasets, study documents, web pages, etc.
displayName: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) of the resources related to the given resource, e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents or links to web pages. If existing, you can specify identifier(s) of any related resources, e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents, links to web pages, etc.

name: ids_identifier
displayName: Identifier (ID) related to, or associated with, the resource being registered. These can be IDs of related publications, datasets, study documents, web pages, etc. a) Publications like journal articles usually have a DOI, e.g. 10.3238/arztebl.2020.0861. b) A link (URL) starting with "http(s)://" to a web page with any additional information can also be provided here.

name: ids_type
displayName: Type of the identifier of the related resource. Select one value from the list.

name: date
displayName: Date when the identifier of the related resource was assigned.

name: relation_type
dataverseAlias: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)?
displayName: Relationship between the resource being registered (A) and the related resource (B). Select one value from the list.

name: ids_resource_type_general
displayName: Type of the related resource, e.g. journal article, dataset, text, etc. Select one value from the list. For example,. a journal article, dataset, text, etc.

name: ids_nfdi4health
dataverseAlias: Related (sub-)studies, study documents, etc. registered on this portal
displayName: Group of items providing information about related resources registered on this portal. Does the [RESOURCE] have any related resources registered on this portal?

name: ids_nfdi4health_identifier
displayName: Identifier (ID) of the related resource assigned on this portal.

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)?
displayName: Relationship between the resource being registered (A) and the related resource (B).

name: provenance
dataverseAlias: Information about provenance aspects of the data entry
displayName: Group of items providing information about provenance aspects of the data entry on the portal

name: data_source
displayName: Source of information about the resource and the way it was uploaded/collected.

name: verification_date
displayName: Date on which the responsible party last verified the information about the resource, even if no additional or updated information is being submitted.

name: verification_date_user
displayName: User who last verified the information about the resource.

name: resource_first_submitted_date
dataverseAlias: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first submitted for publication
displayName: Date when the resource was first submitted for publication.

name: resource_first_submitted_user
dataverseAlias: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication
displayName: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication.

name: resource_first_posted_date
dataverseAlias: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first posted/published
displayName: Date when the resource was first posted/published.

name: resource_first_posted_user
displayName: User who first posted/published the resource.

name: last_update_submitted_date
dataverseAlias: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was submitted for publication
displayName: Date when the last update of the resource was submitted for publication.

name: last_update_submitted_user
dataverseAlias: User who submitted the last update of the [RESOURCE]
displayName: User who submitted the last update of the resource.

name: last_update_posted_date
dataverseAlias: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was posted/published
displayName: Date when the last update of the resource was posted/published.

name: last_update_posted_user
dataverseAlias: User who posted/published the last update
displayName: User who posted/published the last update.

name: provenance_resource_version
dataverseAlias: Version number of the resource within the portal/system
displayName: Version number of the resource within the portal/system.

name: resource_use_rights_label
dataverseAlias: CC BY-NC 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial 4.0 International)

name: resource_use_rights_label
dataverseAlias: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial Share Alike 4.0 International)

name: resource_use_rights_label
dataverseAlias: CC BY-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International)

name: relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is new version of B

name: relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is original form of B

name: relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is previous version of B

name: relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is variant form of B

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is new version of B

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is original form of B

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is previous version of B

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is variant form of B

name: verification_date_user
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users

name: resource_first_submitted_user
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users

name: resource_first_posted_user
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users

name: last_update_submitted_user
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users

name: last_update_posted_user
dataverseAlias: Names from the list of users
